content: row 102- 108 repeat row 100 & 101 row 109 - slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 slip 4st purlwise onto a cable needle & place behind k next 4 st k4 off the cable needle p10 slip 4st purlwise onto a cable needle & place forward k next 4 st k4 off the cable needle * 3x p10 k p 2x k row 110 - slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x * k10 p8 * 6x k10 p k 2x p row 111 - slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 k8* 6x p10 k p 2x k row 112-116 repeat row 110 & 111 row 117 - slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 slip 4st purlwise onto a cable needle & place behind k next 4 st k4 off the cable needle p10 slip 4st purlwise onto a cable needle & place forward k next 4 st k4 off the cable needle * 3x p10 k p 2x k row 118 slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x *k10 p8 * 6x k10 p k 2x p row 119 - slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 k8 * 6x p10 k p 2x k row 120- 124 repeat row 118 & 119 row 125 - slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 k4 mb k3 p10 k3 mb k4 * 3x p10 k p 2x k row 126 slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x * k10 p8 * 6x k10 p k 2x p row 127 slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x * p10 k8 * 6x p10 k p 2x k row 128 repeat row 126 row 129 - slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x *p10 slip 2st purlwise onto a cable needle & place behind work k2 k stitches off the cable needle slip 2st purlwise onto the cable needle & place forward k2 k stitches off the cable* repeat 6x p10 k p 2x k row 130 - slip the 1st st purlwise p k 2x k10 p8 6x k10 p k 2x p row 131 - slip the 1st st purlwise k p 2x p10 k8 6x p10 k p 2x k row 132 - slip the 1st st p k 2x k120 p k 2x p row 133 - slip the 1st st k p 2x p120 k p 2x k row 134-141 repeat row 132 & 133 row 142 - slip the 1st st purlwise k & p across row 143 - slip the 1st st purlwise p & k across row 144-151 repeat row 142 & 143 bind off to complete copyright stacy cottle 2012 use of this pattern is limited to personal only items can not be knit in to be sold charity items for auction must have the authors permission before sales
